title: Data Type Explorer
description: Write a program that declares and initializes variables of different data types (integer, float, string, boolean) and then prints out their values and respective data types. Use a loop to iterate over the variables and print their information.
sample_output:
Variable 1: 10, Type: int
Variable 2: 3.14, Type: float
Variable 3: Hello, Type: str
Variable 4: True, Type: bool
